name: 私人书签管理项目
tagline: 这是一个个人书签管理开源项目
body:
### 关于(About).
这是一个私人书签管理项目，会员可以通过分类和标签的形式保存网络上的所有链接，同时增加了基于Chrome的书签插件，方便一键添加书签内容。

该项目基于rails_apps_composer gem构建，更多Rails_app_composer请参见:
https://github.com/RailsApps/rails_apps_composer
provided by the RailsApps Project:
http://railsapps.github.com/

This application requires:
```
Ruby version 1.9.2
Rails version 3.2.12
```

### 功能特点(Preferences)

```
  {
  :authentication => devise
  :authorization => cancan
  :ban_spiders => true
  :better_errors => true
  :bootstrap => sass
  :database => mysql2
  :dev_webserver => webrick
  :devise_modules => default
  :email => gmail
  :fixtures => factory_girl
  :form_builder => simple_form
  :frontend => bootstrap
  :git => true
  :integration => cucumber
  :jsruntime => true
  :local_env_file => true
  :quiet_assets => true
  :railsapps => rails3-bootstrap-devise-cancan
  :rvmrc => false
  :starter_app => admin_app
  :templates => erb
  :unit_test => rspec
  }
```

### 效果展示(Demo)
![效果展示](http://inruby.com/resource/picture/1/1373533381.jpg)
![效果展示](http://inruby.com/resource/picture/1/1373533419.jpg)

### 联系(Support or Contact)
这是一个开源项目，由(@krongk)一人维护，关于我的更多信息请浏览http://www.about.me/kenrome. 邮件联络请发送到:master@inruby.com
